actions.committee: Committee on International Relations, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on International Relations, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: Declaring that the provision of humanitarian assistance, including United States agricultural products, for Iraq is in the national security interest of the United States.

summary.text: Commends the Department of Defense (DOD) for recognizing the need for the delivery of humanitarian and reconstruction assistance for Iraq through DOD's Office of Reconstruction and Humanitarian Assistance. Declares that the provision of humanitarian assistance, including U.S. agricultural commodities, for Iraq is in the national security interest of the United States and that such assistance should be transported on U.S.-flag vessels.

titles.title: Declaring that the provision of humanitarian assistance, including United States agricultural products, for Iraq is in the national security interest of the United States.
